name: object-property-reference
description: Represents a reference to a specific property of a BACnet object, optionally including the array index for precise identification.

fields.name: object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the BACnet object containing the property.

fields.name: property-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the property within the object.

fields.name: property-array-index
fields.description: The index within an array property, if applicable. Optional.
